title: BRIEF-Hanover Insurance Group Explores Strategic Alternatives For Its International Specialty Business
text:
March 28, 2018 / 4:35 PM / Updated 21 minutes ago BRIEF-Hanover Insurance Group Explores Strategic Alternatives For Its International Specialty Business Reuters Staff 
March 28 (Reuters) - Hanover Insurance Group Inc: 
* THE HANOVER INSURANCE GROUP IS EXPLORING STRATEGIC ALTERNATIVES FOR ITS INTERNATIONAL SPECIALTY BUSINESS 
* HANOVER INSURANCE GROUP INC - RETAINED GOLDMAN SACHS & CO., LLC. TO SERVE AS ITS ADVISER THROUGH PROCESS 
* HANOVER INSURANCE GROUP INC - ‚ÄçCONFIRMED UNDERTAKING REVIEW OF STRATEGIC ALTERNATIVES, INCLUDING A POSSIBLE SALE, FOR LONDON-BASED CHAUCER Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
